label: 東屋
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: A saibara song in which a man arrives at a woman’s door in the pouring rain and demands to be admitted.  The woman, inside, answers that the door is unlocked and urges him to come in.  The “eastern cottage” was a form of thatched house characteristic of eastern Japan.[催馬楽][RK]
